Blog.post: Inspired by Spending My Time-nya Roxette, I just want to write this lyric for "someone" who was very nice before... but somehow you have changed now. It is also for you guys who realize that LOVE is just a silly game.... You play, You win, only to lose .... Anyway, good luck for "YOU" always. Regards, ROXETTE - Spending My Time What's the time? Seems it’s already morning I see the sky, it’s so beautiful and blue The TV's on But the only thing showing is a picture of you Oh, I get up and make myself some coffee I try to read a bit but the story's too thin I thank the Lord above That you're not there to see me In this shape I'm in Spending my time Watching the days go by Feeling so small I stare at the wall Hoping that you think of me too I'm spending my time I try to call but I don't know what to tell you I leave a kiss on your answering machine Oh, help me please Is there someone who can make me Wake up from this dream? Spending my time Watching the days go by Feeling so small I stare at the wall Hoping that you are missing me too I'm spending my time Watching the sun go down I fall asleep to the sound Of "tears of a clown" A prayer gone blind I'm spending my time My friends keep telling me: Hey, life will go on Time will make sure I’ll get over you This silly game of love you play you win only to lose Spending my time Watching the days go by Feeling so small I stare at the wall Hoping that you think of me too I'm spending my time Watching the sun go down I fall asleep to the sound Of "tears of a clown" A prayer gone blind I'm spending my time I can play without to lose

Dear all, Seneng juga bisa punya web walaupun masih simple banget. Sebenernya sih pengennya bikin sendiri dari Front Page, tapi waktunya belum ada. Udah coba2 sih tapi ya itu tadi.... terbatas waktu. Ternyata mesti lebih banyak belajar lagi ya! Well, first of all, I just want to introduce my self. My name is Lisa Nazifah, as you can see details in my profile. I have 2 siblings : 1 elder brother and 1 younger sister. My brother is 27 and my sister is 22. I am from Jakarta, Indonesia now living in Newcastle upon Tyne, UK, untuk menuntut sedikit ilmu keduniawian(ceilee...formal banget sih). Bagi temen2 yang tinggal di sekitar Jakarta, tau jalan Pramuka gak?? Nah, rumahku ada di jalan itu, tepatnya deket pintu kereta Pramuka, tau gak?? (kasiaaan deh kalo gak tau....!) Alhamdulillah, abis lulus S1 jurusan Teknik Kimia di Fakultas Teknik urlLink Universitas Muhammadiyah Jakarta tahun 2002 lalu, aku dikasih rezeki sekaligus amanah untuk melanjutkan study S2 di UK ini dengan scholarship di bidang yag sama. And now, jadilah aku salah seorang student master di urlLink University of Newcastle upon Tyne tepatnya di Chemical Engineering Faculty. Course yang aku ambil namanya : Sustainable Engineering. Kuliah di luar ternyata memang beda banget ya ama kuliah di Indonesia. Tugasnya banyaaaaaaak banget!!! Sampe pusing and capek banget mikirinnya (baru dipikirin doang tuh, belom dikerjain....hehehe). Udah gitu standar nilainya juga tinggi lagi!! Perasaan kalo ngerjain assignment itu udah baguus deh, gak taunya nilainya cuma 60 % or paling tinggi 70 %. Duh, bete banget sih... Sekarang aja seharusnya ngerjain assignment nih, eh malahan posting! Abis masih males banget nih. Gimana dong? Bulan ini aja ada at least 5 tugas project yang harus diselesaikan, belum lagi disertasi yang dikejar submit date pertengahan Agustus nanti. Hhhhh...penat rasanya. Ini dikarenakan Master di UK itu cuma butuh 1 tahun saja fulltime. So, jadilah jadwalnya teramat sangat padat. But anyway, this is the risk that I have to deal with. Yang penting tetep berusaha semaksimal mungkin sambil terus berdoa. Hasilnya serahkan saja sepenuhnya sama Yang Maha Kuasa, Rabbul Alamin. Doain ya... Ok deh,kayaknya udahan dulu, I hope my introduction is enough. Kalo belom cukup, nanti deh aku lanjutin lagi. See You...

Assalamu alaikum Dear all... This is my first posting in this web. Well, I just hope that I could always improve this web for future use. Gitu aja kali ye... untuk pertama kali...ini juga baru cobaa-coba:) Nanti kalo berhasil, coba posting lagi, OK??? Wassalam.
